author: roddey
msg: Fixed an error message so that it indicated the correct radix for the rep
token. Get all of the basic output formatting functionality in place for
at least ICU and Win32 transcoders.

author: lehors
msg: moved the value attribute from NodeImpl to every class that really
needs it, so that others (including ElementImpl and AttrImpl) are smaller

author: lehors
msg: moved the name attribute from NodeImpl to every class that really
needs it, so that others (including TextImpl) are smaller

author: roddey
msg: Now the low level formatter handles doing char refs for
unrepresentable chars (in addition to the replacement char style

author: lehors
msg: got rid of the owned attribute,
renamed parentNode to ownerNode to make it clear it's not always the parent
